name: Demi Dash God: Dash
description:
Keyboard controls:
W/Up Arrow (Pressed) - Jump

S/Down Arrow (Held) - Dive

Gamepad controls:

Up Dpad/Up Left Stick/ Bottom Face Button (Pressed) - Jump

Down DPad/Down Left Stick (Held) - Dive

Created as part of the Games Wales Community Game Jam.

Alex Payne - Programmer (GitHub: Payne325)

Joshua Barreto - Programmer (GitHub: zesterer)

Chris Light - Programmer and Sound Design (Gitlab: cjlight)

Bryn Lloyd - Art Design (Facebook Page: BrynLloydArt)
